closeDrawer(int).Description: Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerActions#close_E@ with perform after matching a view. This method will be removed in the next release.

open(int).Description: Creates an action which opens the @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout_E@ drawer with the gravity. This method blocks until the drawer is fully open. No operation if the drawer is already open.

open().Description: Creates an action which opens the @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout_E@ drawer with gravity START. This method blocks until the drawer is fully open. No operation if the drawer is already open.

closeDrawer(int, int).Description: Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerActions#open_E@ with perform after matching a view. This method will be removed in the next release.

openDrawer(int).Description: Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerActions#open_E@ with perform after matching a view. This method will be removed in the next release.

openDrawer(int, int).Description: Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerActions#open_E@ with perform after matching a view. This method will be removed in the next release.

close().Description: Creates an action which closes the @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout_E@ with gravity START. This method blocks until the drawer is fully closed. No operation if the drawer is already closed.

close(int).Description: Creates an action which closes the @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout_E@ with the gravity. This method blocks until the drawer is fully closed. No operation if the drawer is already closed.
